short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aiso Search:easy-to-use Sidebar search, Bing, Google, Metaso Ai, Baidu, 360
short.zh_CN: Aiso爱搜，好用的侧边栏搜索，百度、Bing、Google、Metaso Ai、360搜索

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aiso: Your powerful sidebar search assistant

Effortlessly enhance your browsing experience! Our Chrome extension brings you convenient sidebar search functionality, making your web surfing more efficient than ever.

Key Features:

* Sidebar Search: Search directly from the current page without opening a new tab
* Customizable Search Engines: Support for multiple search engines including Bing, Google, Baidu, and more to meet your diverse needs
* Search History: Easily view and repeat your previous searches

Whether you're a student, professional, or casual internet user, this extension will make your searches more convenient and efficient. Install now and experience a smarter way of browsing the web!
long.zh_CN:
您的强大的侧边栏AI搜索助手

轻松提升您的浏览体验!我们的Chrome扩展为您带来便捷的侧边栏搜索功能,让您的网上冲浪更加高效。

主要特性:
* 侧边栏搜索： 无需打开新标签页，直接在当前页面进行搜索。
* 自定义搜索引擎：支持百度、秘塔AI搜索、Kimi、GPT、Bing、Google等多个搜索引擎，满足您的不同需求。
* 搜索历史记录： 轻松查看和重复之前的搜索。

无论您是学生、专业人士还是普通网民,这款扩展都能让您的搜索更加便捷、高效。立即安装,体验更智能的网络浏览方式！
